meanings.definition: A person who is dirty, unkempt, or unpleasant.
meanings.sent1: The scuzzbag sat alone in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: Don't trust that scuzzbag; he's always up to no good.
meanings.sent3: The scuzzbag tried to sell me a 'magic' rock for $100!
meanings.sent4: The alley was filled with scuzzbags lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The image of the scuzzbag's greasy hair and torn clothes stuck in my mind.

meanings.definition: To behave in a dishonest or untrustworthy manner.
meanings.sent1: She decided to scuzzbag her way out of paying the bill.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe he would scuzzbag his own friends like that.
meanings.sent3: He tried to scuzzbag his boss by pretending to be sick.
meanings.sent4: The politician's attempt to scuzzbag his constituents backfired.
meanings.sent5: The scam artist scuzzbagged his way into the old lady's trust.

meanings.sent1: The scuzzbag car hadn't been washed in years.
meanings.sent2: The scuzzbag walls of the abandoned house were a breeding ground for mold.
meanings.sent3: The scuzzbag floor looked like it hadn't been cleaned since the dinosaurs roamed.
meanings.sent4: The scuzzbag appearance of the alley made me hold my breath.
meanings.sent5: The scuzzbag hands left dirty marks on everything they touched.
